title: What Are We Waiting For (feat. Ellise)
lyrics:
Been to Paris, LA and New York
I still haven't found what I want
And nothing compares to your love
So what are we waiting for? Ooh
I had my reasons, love without meaning

We all got demons, trust me I've seen 'em

You had your reasons, caught up in feelings

Wouldn't believe it, said you were leaving



And now we're fucked up but you give me good vibes

Something real, I forgot what it feels like

Them late nights, cheap thrills and them fake highs

Made me realize I want something real



I've been to Paris, LA and New York

I still haven't found what I want

And nothing compares to your love

So what are we waiting for? Ooh

Been to Paris, LA and New York

There's beauty behind every door

But nothing compares to yours

So what are we waiting for?



I'm never gonna leave my, leave my love

I'm never gonna leave my, leave my love

There's nothing in this world that I want more

I'm never gonna leave my, leave my love



And now we're fucked up but you give me good vibes

Something real, I forgot what it feels like

Them late nights, cheap thrills and them fake highs

Made me realize I want something real



I've been to Paris, LA and New York

I still haven't found what I want

And nothing compares to your love

So what are we waiting for? (So what are we waiting for?)

Been to Paris, LA and New York

There's beauty behind every door

But nothing compares to yours

So what are we waiting for? Ooh ooh

So what are we waiting for?



Ooh
